pv36:1.2: ambasakkaro → ambasakkharo (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2); appasakkaro (mr)
pv36:12.1: Addhā paṭiññā me tadā ahu → paṭiññātametaṁ tadāhu (mr); paṭiññā na mete tadā ahu (?)
pv36:14.5: Sabbampi akkhissaṁ → sabbaṁ ācikkhissaṁ (bj); sabbaṁ akkhissaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2)
pv36:16.1: Vesāliyā nagarassa → tassa nagarassa (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2)
pv36:37.3: majja → samajja (bj, pts-vp-pli1-2); sa majja (sya1ed, sya2ed)
pv36:46.3: bhijjanti ca te → bhijjanti tava (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
pv36:51.2: Tappaccayā vāpi → tappaccayā tāhaṁ (bj, pts-vp-pli2); tappaccayā cāhaṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
pv36:59.3: neva maṁ lacchasi → teneva maṁ na lacchasi (bj); teneva maṁ licchavi (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); teneva maṁ na lacchasi (pts-vp-pli2); teneva maṁ lacchasi (mr)
pv36:63.2: Teneva saha → tena samaṁ (bj); tena saha (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
pv36:66.4: Paṇihitadaṇḍo → paṇītadaṇḍo (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2, mr) | anusattarūpo → anupakkarūpo (mr)
pv36:77.5: Imañca ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgavarenupetaṁ → imañca aṭṭhaṅgavaraṁ upetaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
pv36:78.6: vippasannena cetasā → sadā puññaṁ pavaḍḍhati (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
pv36:80.3: Muñca tuvaṁ → mucceyya so tvaṁ (bj, pts-vp-pli2, mr); mucceyya so (sya1ed, sya2ed); muñca so tvaṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
pv36:84.3: vikampāmi → vikappāmi (bj, pts-vp-pli2); vikkappāmi (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
